name: Arrow (itch) (sendhelpidfk)
description:
An incredibly basic, fast-paced abstract arcade game created as a port of a friend's old scratch game and as a way for me to practice GMS2 and LMMS. It's not finished and it likely won't be, given that I still have school to contend with.

I apologize in advance for the music.

Arcade:
An updated version of the original game. Enemies killed drop XP, which can be moused over to increase a point multiplier for future kills.

Classic:
The original game, ported as-is - even using the original music! Which probably isn't a good idea, given that it's not public domain. No multipliers, no frills - just destroy enemies.

Controls:
Mouse: Aim
Left Click: Fire

Things that Do Not Work™️:
 -High scores
 -Any sort of settings menu whatsoever
 -Probably some other crap I'm forgetting

Credits:
sendhelpidfk - programming, music for menu and arcade
crobatchaser23 (scratch account no longer exists) - original game

Music Used:
Vexento - Masked Heroes (Classic Loop)
minecraftuniverse - Eclipse (Classic Game Over)
